channel.title: mozsummit on Intellectual Web
channel.description: Recent content in mozsummit on Intellectual Web

item.title: Mozilla Summit 2013
item.description: I could not sleep the night i got the invitation mail from Mozilla to attend Mozilla Summit 2013. I was roaming around my college hostel waking up everybody from their sleep just to tell them that “I have been invited to Mozilla Summit 2013 at Santa Clara, CA”. I was really very excited as this was be my first international travel. Finally the month of October came. rtnpro and I left for bangalore airport early (all due to exitement).
